issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A fix has been committed, and will be part of the next release
status.name: Release Pending

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A user story. Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete.
issuetype.name: Story

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: *Assessment* After federating HTTPS enabled clouds, users of federated accounts aren't able to access both regions. If a user attempts to access a non-native region, the following error appears: {code} [root@g-15-01 ~]# euca-describe-regions --region devops-admin@ghostface REGION dead-prez https://ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ REGION ghostface https://ec2.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ [root@g-15-01 ~]# euca-describe-regions --region devops-admin@dead-prez euca-describe-regions: error (403 Forbidden): com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: Invalid identity {code} *Workaround* The workaround is to add ":443" to the 'identity' endpoint for each region in the region configuration file. {code} # cat federated-region.json { "Regions": [ { "CertificateFingerprint": "1D:BB:7B:E6:4F:1B:D2:66:29:76:81:2B:70:59:10:D7:2D:E9:BB:42:E5:71:B1:FC:28:96:94:4C:E9:EE:A3:AC", "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256", "SslCertificateFingerprint": "0F:32:38:AE:BE:C1:DC:66:D9:39:13:34:0F:C6:81:7D:CC:CA:77:EB:2F:2B:0B:EA:2E:82:66:62:A7:BE:A9:69", "SslCertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256", "IdentifierPartitions": [ 1 ], "Name": "ghostface", "Services": [ { "Endpoints": [ "https://identity.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:443/" ], "Type": "identity" }, { "Endpoints": [ "https://ec2.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/" ], "Type": "compute" } ] }, { "CertificateFingerprint": "97:0F:AC:19:9A:B7:81:3B:71:E0:80:A5:E8:8A:BC:24:B1:9F:1A:96:19:BA:76:C7:C1:39:64:3C:CC:A1:C8:CB", "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256", "SslCertificateFingerprint": "52:53:43:49:38:61:40:8C:05:D7:D6:C5:B3:C5:4E:A8:DF:9C:7D:6D:9F:E7:4A:40:39:F3:CB:CB:EF:9D:A0:B6", "SslCertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256", "IdentifierPartitions": [ 2 ], "Name": "dead-prez", "Services": [ { "Endpoints": [ "https://identity.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:443/" ], "Type": "identity" }, { "Endpoints": [ "https://ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/" ], "Type": "compute" } ] } ] } {code} *Signs* - Debug output for euca-describe-availability-zones: {code} [root@g-15-01 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones --region devops-admin@dead-prez --debug 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 DEBUG DescribeAvailabilityZones parsed arguments: {'filters': None, 'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'region': 'devops-admin@dead-prez', 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None, 'ZoneName': []} 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 INFO Config finding region option ec2-url 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 DEBUG Config section dead-prez 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 INFO Config found dead-prez::ec2-url = 'https://ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/' 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 INFO Config finding region option name 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 DEBUG Config section dead-prez 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 INFO Config found dead-prez::name = 'dead-prez' 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 INFO Config finding global option max-retries 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 INFO Config novalue for max-retries 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 INFO Config finding global option timeout 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 INFO Config novalue for timeout 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 INFO Config finding region option verify-ssl 2015-10-22 17:43:13,154 DEBUG Config section dead-prez 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 INFO Config found dead-prez::verify-ssl = 'true' 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 INFO Config finding user option key-id 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 DEBUG Config section devops-admin 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 DEBUG Config jump-to 001494890016:devops-admin::key-id (from devops-admin) 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 DEBUG Config section 001494890016:devops-admin 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 INFO Config found 001494890016:devops-admin::key-id = 'AKIABM3I3UOJV2DACYX6' 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 INFO Config finding user option secret-key 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 DEBUG Config section devops-admin 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 DEBUG Config jump-to 001494890016:devops-admin::secret-key (from devops-admin) 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 DEBUG Config section 001494890016:devops-admin 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 INFO Config found 001494890016:devops-admin::secret-key = 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 DEBUG HmacV4Auth using auth info from configuration 2015-10-22 17:43:13,155 INFO DescribeAvailabilityZones parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeAvailabilityZones', 'Version': '2014-06-15'} 2015-10-22 17:43:13,156 DEBUG DescribeAvailabilityZones sending flattened params as form data 2015-10-22 17:43:13,159 INFO EC2 sending request (attempt 1 of 3) 2015-10-22 17:43:13,170 DEBUG HmacV4Auth payload hash: b9e5b7fd0a759e5ae3e30e01abd845b078c180babd882526042962647a363bfd 2015-10-22 17:43:13,170 DEBUG HmacV4Auth scope: 20151023/dead-prez/ec2/aws4_request 2015-10-22 17:43:13,170 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical URI: / 2015-10-22 17:43:13,170 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical query: 2015-10-22 17:43:13,170 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical headers: ['accept:*/*', 'accept-encoding:gzip, deflate', 'connection:keep-alive', 'content-length:51', 'content-type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded', 'host:ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com', 'x-amz-content-sha256:b9e5b7fd0a759e5ae3e30e01abd845b078c180babd882526042962647a363bfd', 'x-amz-date:20151023T004313Z'] 2015-10-22 17:43:13,170 DEBUG HmacV4Auth signed headers: accept;accept-encoding;connection;content-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date 2015-10-22 17:43:13,171 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical request: 'POST\n/\n\naccept:*/*\naccept-encoding:gzip, deflate\nconnection:keep-alive\ncontent-length:51\ncontent-type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded\nhost:ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com\nx-amz-content-sha256:b9e5b7fd0a759e5ae3e30e01abd845b078c180babd882526042962647a363bfd\nx-amz-date:20151023T004313Z\n\naccept;accept-encoding;connection;content-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date\nb9e5b7fd0a759e5ae3e30e01abd845b078c180babd882526042962647a363bfd' 2015-10-22 17:43:13,171 DEBUG HmacV4Auth string to sign: 'AWS4-HMAC-SHA256\n20151023T004313Z\n20151023/dead-prez/ec2/aws4_request\nd5bfdb0bf20b0e45119bfafe1ed8197357aeeb0f095171aea86c800e6bdb073b' 2015-10-22 17:43:13,171 DEBUG HmacV4Auth signature: 5fdf277968233671cdeabee5638f4b79930c07e6029be5ad895b9dc953d3fe1f 2015-10-22 17:43:13,171 DEBUG HmacV4Auth signed headers: accept;accept-encoding;connection;content-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date 2015-10-22 17:43:13,171 DEBUG EC2 request method: POST 2015-10-22 17:43:13,171 DEBUG EC2 request url: https://ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ 2015-10-22 17:43:13,171 DEBUG EC2 request header: Accept: */* 2015-10-22 17:43:13,171 DEBUG EC2 request header: Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate 2015-10-22 17:43:13,171 DEBUG EC2 request header: Authorization: AWS4-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=AKIABM3I3UOJV2DACYX6/20151023/dead-prez/ec2/aws4_request, SignedHeaders=accept;accept-encoding;connection;content-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date, Signature=5fdf277968233671cdeabee5638f4b79930c07e6029be5ad895b9dc953d3fe1f 2015-10-22 17:43:13,172 DEBUG EC2 request header: Connection: keep-alive 2015-10-22 17:43:13,172 DEBUG EC2 request header: Content-Length: 51 2015-10-22 17:43:13,172 DEBUG EC2 request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded 2015-10-22 17:43:13,172 DEBUG EC2 request header: Host: ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com 2015-10-22 17:43:13,172 DEBUG EC2 request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.3.0-pre1-19-g15b10eb (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-573.7.1.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.4.0 requests/2.6.0 2015-10-22 17:43:13,172 DEBUG EC2 request header: X-Amz-Content-SHA256: b9e5b7fd0a759e5ae3e30e01abd845b078c180babd882526042962647a363bfd 2015-10-22 17:43:13,172 DEBUG EC2 request header: X-Amz-Date: 20151023T004313Z 2015-10-22 17:43:13,172 DEBUG EC2 request data: Action: DescribeAvailabilityZones 2015-10-22 17:43:13,172 DEBUG EC2 request data: Version: 2014-06-15 2015-10-22 17:43:13,253 DEBUG EC2 response time: 0.080 seconds 2015-10-22 17:43:13,253 ERROR EC2 response status: 403 2015-10-22 17:43:13,253 DEBUG EC2 response header: connection: close 2015-10-22 17:43:13,253 DEBUG EC2 response header: content-length: 244 2015-10-22 17:43:13,253 DEBUG EC2 response header: content-type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 2015-10-22 17:43:13,253 DEBUG EC2 response header: date: Fri, 23 Oct 2015 00:43:13 UTC 2015-10-22 17:43:13,256 DEBUG DescribeAvailabilityZones -- response content -- 403 Forbiddencom.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: Invalid identitycom.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: Invalid identity 2015-10-22 17:43:13,256 DEBUG DescribeAvailabilityZones -- end of response content -- 2015-10-22 17:43:13,257 INFO DescribeAvailabilityZones result: failure euca-describe-availability-zones: error (403 Forbidden): com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: Invalid identity Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/bin/euca-describe-availability-zones", line 6, in euca2ools.commands.ec2.describeavailabilityzones.DescribeAvailabilityZones.run() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 305, in run cmd.handle_cli_exception(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 302, in run result = cmd.main() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 205, in main response = self.send() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 276, in send return BaseRequest.send(self) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 171, in send return self.handle_server_error(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 158, in send auth=self.auth) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 226, in send_request self.handle_http_error(response) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/ec2/__init__.py", line 64, in handle_http_error raise AWSError(response) euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (403, 'Forbidden', '403 Forbidden', 'com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: Invalid identity') {code} *Steps* # Setup two Eucalyptus 4.2 clouds with Eucalyptus DNS enabled, and HTTPS configured: #* [hspencer-1809|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1809/] #* [hspencer-1812|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1812/] # Create federated setup using the following region configuration file: {code} { "Regions": [ { "IdentifierPartitions": [ 1 ], "Services": [ { "Endpoints": [ "https://identity.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/" ], "Type": "identity" }, { "Endpoints": [ "https://ec2.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/" { ], "Endpoints": [ "Type": "compute" } ], "Name": "ghostface", "CertificateFingerprint": "1D:BB:7B:E6:4F:1B:D2:66:29:76:81:2B:70:59:10:D7:2D:E9:BB:42:E5:71:B1:FC:28:96:94:4C:E9:EE:A3:AC", "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256" }, { "IdentifierPartitions": [ 2 ], { "Services": [ { "Endpoints": [ "https://identity.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/" ], "Type": "identity" }, { "Endpoints": [ "https://ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/" ], "Type": "compute" } ], "Name": "dead-prez", "CertificateFingerprint": "97:0F:AC:19:9A:B7:81:3B:71:E0:80:A5:E8:8A:BC:24:B1:9F:1A:96:19:BA:76:C7:C1:39:64:3C:CC:A1:C8:CB", "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256" } ] } {code} # Confirm federation works correctly: {code} [root@g-15-01 ~]# euca-describe-regions --region euca-admin@ghostface REGION dead-prez https://ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ REGION ghostface https://ec2.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ [root@g-15-01 ~]# euca-describe-regions --region dp-admin@dead-prez REGION dead-prez https://ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ REGION ghostface https://ec2.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ {code} # Create federated account (make sure and add information for both regions in ini file): {code} [root@g-15-01 ~]# euare-accountcreate development-operations -w > .euca/devops-admin.ini --region euca-admin@ghostface # cat .euca/devops-admin.ini [region ghostface] autoscaling-url = https://autoscaling.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ bootstrap-url = https://bootstrap.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ cloudformation-url = https://cloudformation.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ ec2-url = https://ec2.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ elasticloadbalancing-url = https://elasticloadbalancing.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ iam-url = https://iam.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ monitoring-url = https://monitoring.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ properties-url = https://properties.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ reporting-url = https://reporting.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ s3-url = https://s3.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ sts-url = https://sts.a-18.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ [region dead-prez] autoscaling-url = https://autoscaling.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ bootstrap-url = https://bootstrap.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ cloudformation-url = https://cloudformation.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ ec2-url = https://ec2.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ elasticloadbalancing-url = https://elasticloadbalancing.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ iam-url = https://iam.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ monitoring-url = https://monitoring.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ properties-url = https://properties.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ reporting-url = https://reporting.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ s3-url = https://s3.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ sts-url = https://sts.e-41.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/ [user 001674525590:devops-admin] key-id = AKIABSLFDKLIDWKG2OSK secret-key = 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 account-id = 001674525590 {code} # Try to run DescribeAvailabilityZones on both regions: {code} [root@g-15-01 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones --region devops-admin@ghostface AVAILABILITYZONE sour-soul available [root@g-15-01 ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones --region devops-admin@dead-prez euca-describe-availability-zones: error (403 Forbidden): com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: Invalid identity {code}
fields.summary: HTTPS endpoints for 'identity' cause federated IAM behavior to not work correctly

comments.body:
Issue has been fixed.  Refer to QA-510 for steps.

Eucalyptus Version: {{4.2.2-0.24187.20.20160329git4b58c04.el6}}
